title: An Phu Intersection
description: Heavy construction, container trucks, complex detours causing confusion.

title: My Thuy Roundabout
description: High collision risk with container trucks due to blind spots.

title: Nguyen Tat Thanh Jam
description: Narrow road operating at 140% capacity, mixed heavy/light traffic.

title: Hang Xanh Intersect
description: High-speed entry point, confusing multi-layer traffic flow.

title: Dan Chu Roundabout
description: Chaotic large-diameter roundabout, difficult for novices to navigate.

title: Phu My Bridge
description: Steep gradient and high crosswinds dangerous for motorbikes.

title: Truong Chinh St
description: Chronic gridlock, primary gateway to NW suburbs and industrial zones.

title: Cong Hoa Street
description: Main airport artery, severe rush hour jams causing flight delays.

title: An Suong Intersect
description: Complex multi-level interchange with heavy provincial bus traffic.

title: Go Vap 5-Way
description: Confusing 5-way intersection (Ngu Nga Chuong Cho), heavy volume.

title: Nguyen Van Linh/QL50
description: Collision risk between highway speed vehicles and turning motorbikes.

title: Tan Son Nhat Entry
description: Congestion at airport gates, chaotic taxi pickup/drop-off.

title: Xo Viet Nghe Tinh
description: Bottleneck towards Eastern Bus Station, extreme evening density.

title: Dinh Bo Linh St
description: Heavy bus traffic entering Mien Dong station causing hazards.

title: Bui Vien Pocketing
description: High pickpocket risk in crowded bars and walking street.

title: Ben Thanh Snatch
description: Bag snatching risk at market perimeter/roundabout crossings.

title: Nguyen Hue Theft
description: Phone snatching while taking photos on pedestrian street.

title: Pham Ngu Lao St
description: Backpack theft from motorbikes/sidewalks near bus offices.

title: War Remnants Area
description: Cyclo scams and petty theft near museum entrance.

title: Saigon Post Office
description: Pickpocketing inside crowded historic hall.

title: Opera House Area
description: Taxi overcharging and aggressive solicitation at night.

title: Tao Dan Park Night
description: Isolation risk, theft/assault if walking alone late.

title: District 4 Riverside
description: Snatch theft risk on lonely roads connecting to D1.

title: September 23 Park
description: Petty theft and solicitation/drug dealing at night.

title: Huynh Tan Phat Fld
description: Severe tidal flooding, impassable for bikes/cars.

title: Tran Xuan Soan
description: River overflows banks, deep water obscuring road edge.

title: Le Van Luong Fld
description: Frequent deep flooding during high tides cutting access.

title: Thao Dien Flood
description: Luxury area streets submerged by tide/rain mix.

title: Thu Duc Market
description: Flash floods from rain, drain failure creates deep pools.

title: Nguyen Huu Canh
description: Historic flood spot, pumps often overwhelmed by storms.

title: Nguyen Van Qua
description: Heavy rain causes deep street flooding in D12.

title: Kinh Duong Vuong
description: Western bus station area flooding affects regional travel.

title: High Tide Warning
description: Citywide tidal peak, riverbanks overflow low areas.

title: Typhoon Rain Risk
description: Seasonal downpours cause flash floods citywide.

title: Ring Road 2 Const
description: Road closure/diversions for closing the beltway gap.

title: Metro Ben Thanh
description: Barrier fencing, pedestrian diversions, messy surface.

title: Nguyen Khoai Brg
description: Bridge construction starts late 2025; localized jams.

title: Tran Quoc Hoan Rd
description: New airport road construction zone; narrowed lanes.

title: Ring Road 3 Site
description: Major earthworks on city outskirts; dust and trucks.

title: Thu Thiem Const
description: Ongoing urban development, road changes, closures.

title: Tet Flower Street
description: Nguyen Hue closed for pedestrians; massive crowds.

title: April 30 Parade
description: Major road closures in District 1 for national holiday.

title: NYE Countdown
description: Gridlock and potential crowd crush at Nguyen Hue.

title: Marathon Closure
description: Weekend street bans for city marathon (Le Duan).

title: Fireworks Tunnel
description: Thu Thiem Tunnel closed for fireworks display.

title: Hung King Fest
description: Holiday traffic exodus at gateways (Suoi Tien).

title: Christmas D1
description: Traffic gridlock near Notre Dame/Diamond Plaza.

title: Pho Festival
description: Culinary event, localized crowds in parks.

title: River Festival
description: Events along Bach Dang Wharf; waterside crowds.

title: Lantern Fest
description: Cho Lon (D5) crowds for Mid-Autumn Festival.
